name: Please don't jump
description: A farmer cares a lot about his sheep. And as then and now their enclosure gets out of stock in terms of grass and flowers, the farmer has to move his flock to the second enclosure at the other side of the valley so the other one can replenish. There is a long path ahead of the sheep, so the player (as the farmer) has to protect them on their way so they reach their destination without shortcomings.
